author: coldcolgate
content:
<@144468805697929216> I have been running into a weird issue while using attestant's go-eth2-client.  I got a block header and a block from the zhejiang testnet.  However, it turns out that blockBody.HashTreeRoot() does not equal blockHeader.BodyRoot().  I have verified that both block header and block body are from the same slot (I tried several different slots)

blockBody here is of type capella.BeaconBlockBody and blockHeader is of type phase0.BeaconBlockHeader.  Any ideas as to why this may be?
